website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot Elph 140 IS doesn't have the features of more expensive cameras, but is a decent option for budget-minded photographers.
cons: Lacks Wi-Fi and other advanced features

customer_reviews.title: I love how small this camera is- it's great because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how small this camera is- it's great because it fit in my travel purse and was something that I was able to take with me internationally and not have any issues. The batter life lasted pretty long as well, (about 5ish days- a week) and didn't take too long to charge either. The light adjustment features are pretty good, and my travel photos were much nicer than I anticipated. Great for a no hassle camera for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie De Stefano

customer_reviews.title: This is the first one that has disappointed me. It is small and light and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Canon brand digital cameras. This is the first one that has disappointed me. It is small and light and it takes good pictures, but there is no instruction manual in the package (if you want it you have to download it off the Internet), and the menu/control system is complex and confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: A smart choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera and I'm glad I chose it, as opposed to the Canon Powershot ELPH 135. The ELPH 140 features image stabilization, which the 135 does not. I like the large LED screen and the ease of use of the buttons. The "Help" screen is always available and the tips are written very clearly. This portable camera is easy to put in a pocket. It's really fun to use and the picture quality is excellent! It's a smart choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Bummed. Lens locked up while on a trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bummed. Lens locked up while on a trip to India. No grains of sand or being dropped -- it just failed and I had to spend the rest of my trip shooting pictures from my phone. I think it is a discontinued item from Canon, and this may be why.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Strom

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of it
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of it, it fits right in the pocket so it is easy to carry. There was a problem seeing what you are shooting when the sun was very bright. Otherwise the photos were good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a really good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera with outstanding resolution. Video feature even produces decent video. The only real issue is that sometimes it does not deal well with motion. Also, it has limited ability to take good pictures at night. The only other real issue is that the camera is extremely small and requires agile hands to hold and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rome

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: We love having a camera to take pictures with. And this one has a good stabilization system.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great and just the right size AND it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Was a quick replacement for defunct camera before going on trip, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: lonecow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and does a good job. I keep it in my car and use it mostly on beautiful sunset pictures or near the peacock farm.....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It does an okay job
customer_reviews.text: If I were to buy another, I would spend the extra money for an upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old Olympus. Good-bye blurry photos! Buy it; you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: R M Adams

customer_reviews.title: great camera for family videos/ vlogging
customer_reviews.text: great camera for family videos/ vlogging. Does not come with cable to transfer data so purchase at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's not a bad camera...
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad camera, and it's worth the money, but I don't find myself getting excited about using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT LITTLE CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This camera is packed with a lot of features for the money. the main reason that i bought it was for the image stabilization. I am upgrading from a 3 meg Sony which is great camera but if i moved it , the pictures were blurry, does not happen withe the Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Kempoist

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not happy that it did not provide a cable to download my picture. too many ques when taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. It takes much better pictures than my phone and I just keep it in my purse so it is always at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Camera
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my new camera. It is very easy to use and I'm truly thrilled with the sharp images..
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Nomura

customer_reviews.title: So far this camera has done a great job. (Only had it for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera has done a great job. (Only had it for 3 weeks.) Time will tell the whole story.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for my brother and one for myself for an upcoming trip that we are going on. Some of the sites we are seeing are low light and we are unable to use flash. A friend recommended this camera after I seen pictures she took of low light situations. So far it works great. I can't wait to see that it does while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Steven DuVal

customer_reviews.title: Out of focus imagery.
customer_reviews.text: It is too slow. Causes too many blurry pictures. Any action before the auto focus is set will result in an out of focus image.
customer_reviews.author: Grapester

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH140 IS Digital Camera (Gray) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:GrayKit Includes PowerShot ELPH 135, Wrist Strap WS-800, Battery Pack NB-11L, Battery Charger CB-2LF, Leaflet Getting Started, Printer Promotion Flyer, Warranty Card, Promotional Tag, Packing. USB Cable, Video Cable, SD Card and Solutions Disk Not Included.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

STYLISH SMARTS MADE EASY
For everyday moments and fun times out, the PowerShot ELPH 140 IS has you covered. Super slim and easy to use, this camera has the power to capture beautiful images with a 16.0 Megapixel sensor for excellent resolution and the DIGIC 4+ Image Processor for great performance even in low light. You'll be able to reach further and create more dynamic images with the powerful 8x Optical Zoom, and capture special memories with incredibly lifelike detail in HD video. The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS camera is designed to make spectacular imaging easy. Smart AUTO automatically selects the right settings for 32 shooting situations while Intelligent IS chooses the right stabilization to keep all your shots clear and steady. And a handy Help Button puts clear explanations right on the LCD screen. You'll have fun getting creative and making your shots stand out with Scene modes including Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Miniature Effect.

SPECTACULAR LENS POWER FOR STUNNING IMAGES
8X OPTICAL ZOOM
The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS features an 8x Optical Zoom so more shots are within your reach. You'll love the flexibility that the wide 28–224mm (35mm equivalent) shooting range offers. Plus, the Wide-Angle lens captures expansive image in every shot, adding depth, perspective and grandeur. Landscapes, city scenes, family shots and more benefit from the extra width. Whether you're shooting wide group shots or zooming to the telephoto end, your images are assured to be bright and clear.

BEAUTIFUL IMAGES AND INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE START HERE
16.0 MEGAPIXEL SENSOR
With the PowerShot ELPH 140 IS camera's 16.0 Megapixels of resolution, your images are rich and clear, with textures and tiny details faithfully reproduced even at the long end of the 8x Optical Zoom. This high level of resolution is ideal for creating the largest prints, and allows you the flexibility to blow up and crop any section of an image to express your creativity.


DIGIC 4+ IMAGE PROCESSOR
The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS camera's DIGIC 4+ Image Processor features accelerated processing speed to create fast, responsive performance, giving you a shooting experience that's easy and natural. The DIGIC 4+ Image Processor also enhances image quality in several ways. Processing of high ISO shots has been shortened by 60% compared to the DIGIC 4 Image Processor. This significantly reduces noise for brilliant color, smooth gradations, and beautiful detail even in low light. The processor also allows for the integration of electronic Dynamic IS. This advanced system compensates for multiple motion types, effectively preventing angular blur, shift blur, and blur caused by parallel movement and tilt shift. The result is images that are reliably sharp and clear at all lengths of the camera's zoom. The processor's highly efficient design also extends battery life. 

GORGEOUS HD VIDEO FROM YOUR STILL CAMERA
720P HD VIDEO
Using the slim PowerShot ELPH 140 IS, you can shoot high definition video anytime, anywhere. With a simple push of the dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record every moment in motion. 720p HD video is smooth, vivid, and beautifully lifelike, making it an ideal way to capture special memories. 

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
SMART AUTO
Getting that great shot is as simple as pressing the shutter button on the PowerShot ELPH 140 IS camera with Smart AUTO, which automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. On the PowerShot ELPH 140 IS, detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture, whether you're shooting stills or video. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

SHOOTING MODES
Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Program The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect – a classic photographic distortion – without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with "toy" or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Create brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography. Movie Record video; unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. Actual results may vary from examples shown above.
Final image may vary depending on picture composition.

A STEADY IMAGE IS A BEAUTIFUL IMAGE
INTELLIGENT IS
It's easy to capture clear, steady images with the PowerShot ELPH 140 IS, even in low light without using a tripod. That's because the camera is equipped with Canon's innovative Intelligent IS. The system automatically analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation – allowing you to focus on framing and capturing your shot. For stills, the system selects from Normal IS, Panning IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and Tripod modes. When shooting video, the system selects from Dynamic IS, Powered IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and active Tripod IS modes. New icons clearly mark the image stabilization mode, whether you're shooting still images or video.

Still Image Shooting Normal IS Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning IS Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Tripod When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. Video Recording Dynamic IS Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered IS Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for motion blur that is likely to occur when shooting video while walking. Also compensates for the shift-type camera shake common in macro shooting. Active Tripod IS When shooting video while using a tripod, the image stabilization is active to compensate for slight camera shake. MORE WAYS TO GET CREATIVE
CREATIVE SHOOTING MODES
The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS provides shooting modes that easily give your shots a distinctly artistic feel without the need for any extra lenses and filters. Super Vivid heightens and saturates colors for eye-popping intensity. Poster Effect eliminates gradations between colors for an illustrative feel. Miniature Effect enhances perspective in a scene, blurring the top and bottom to make it look as if it were created with miniature models. You can also make a quirky portrait using the Fisheye Effect or add a beautiful single-tone effect with Monochrome. Toy Camera Effect simulates a vintage look as if capturing the photo using a "toy" or pinhole camera.

A CHARGE THAT LASTS AS LONG AS A MEMORY
ECO MODE
The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS features ECO Mode to provide more shots per single charge through LCD monitor and camera power management. The mode can be activated via a dedicated button for easy power preservation when you are out for the day or the moment is too exciting to put the camera down. ECO Mode quickly wakes the camera from sleep when a button is pressed so you won't miss the moment. When the fun with family and friends runs late into the evening, ECO Mode makes sure your camera keeps up.

HELP YOU WON'T NEED HELP TO FIND
HELP BUTTON
The PowerShot ELPH 140 IS camera is designed to be fun and easy to use, even for beginners. A Help Button on the camera's exterior brings up the help menu any time you need it, right on the LCD screen. From here, you can scroll through a variety of topics that answer your questions with clear explanations, offer helpful shooting advice, and show you diagrams highlighting the position of any buttons you'll need.
feature_bullets: 16.0 Megapixel sensor combined with the DIGIC 4+ Image Processor for outstanding performance.
8x Optical Zoom helps ensure outstanding optical performance and versatility.
Shoot 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations.
Scene Modes such as Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Miniature Effect add an artistic look to your photos.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars37 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
